data.message: it says ifailed to like a post. i have been banned from liking posts. apparently liking a post on facebook is now deemed abusive and i am directed to fully read and understand facebook community standards. wtf does that mean?? i see nothing about liking posts being not allowed. 😭😢😭😢😲😓

replies.message: this is about the 6th time tonight i have got this popup as i attempt to like a post to show i have read it. and then respond. please make it stop doing this? i also had a popup warning that a picture of a ladder and a mirror for sale were threatening and abusive and violated community standards as i tried to post it. 😭😭😭😭 it is traumatizing to see the warning mesaage saying it will ban me forever for doing what everyone does. post pictures and like posts. how am i doing this wrong. i have been on facebook for yearssssss. and do hope this is resolved and not reflecting against my account in any way.

Hi Michelle. We hear your frustration. Blocks are temporary and can last up to a few days. Hold tight! If you think you may have been blocked by mistake, you can file an appeal here: http://bit.ly/2efLaUv. -Joe
the appeal spot didnt work the first time. i will try again. thank you.

Joe sorry but the link you gave says its only for those whose accounts have been disabled and cant log in. ? it is not for those whom have been told the like button cant be used. i see nowhere to appeal anything
there is no way to share the picture here of the screenshot
Facebook you block people and give the lamest answer- which is NOTHING. how does one appeal a block if they DO NOT KNOW WHY THEY WERE BLOCKED?
exactly Mark Snider and facebook never answers back rarely if ever

Facebook good morning, facebook! here is my now daily request for clarification on what happens to those of us who are unable to install apps on our smartphones when you discontinue the mobile messaging site. Looking forward to your response.
Facebook, some fan pages of visitors posted, can comment but can not see posted text. why？
